GS40samapviu:599: indro durbhagatābhayād vijayati (tāṃ kṣayaṃ dvijapatiḥ) lambodaratvaṃ gaṇaḥ

GS40samapviu:940: kaṣāyabhāvānna purīṣabhedī na mūtralo me (nai)va balāsakartā (?) //
GS40samapviu:942: māṣaiḥ samānāṃ phalam ātmagutma(pta) mūcuś ca kākāṇḍaphalaṃ tathaiva //
GS40samapviu:956: kaṭur vipāke madhuraś ca śimbiḥ pravṛddhaviṇmūtra (mā)rutapittalaś ca // 4 //
GS40samapviu:957: sitāsitaḥ pītakaraktavarṇā bhavanti vai naikavidhās tu śibiṃ(mbyaḥ) : //
GS40samapviu:959: īṣatkaṣayo madhuraḥ satikto(ktaḥ) saṃgrāhakaḥ pittakaras tathoṣṇaḥ //
GS40samapviu:960: tilo vipāke madhuro baliṣṭhaḥ snigdho vraṇālepanapathya uktaḥ //
GS40samapviu:963: tileṣu sarpiṣv asita [sarveṣv asitaḥ] pradhāno medhyaḥ sito hīnataras tathānyaḥ //
GS40samapviu:966: grāhyuṣṇo dhṛtikṛt kaṣāyamadhuras tikto vipāke kaṭuḥ
GS40samapviu:970: yavaḥ kaṣāyo madhuro himaś ca kaṭur vipāke kaphapittahāraḥ /
GS40samapviu:971: vraṇeṣu pathyas tilavac ca nityaṃ prabaddhamūtro bahuvātavarśa [rcā]ḥ // 1 //
GS40samapviu:973: medomaruttṛṭ [ḍ] haraṇo virūkṣaḥ prasādanaḥ śoṇitapittayoś ca // 2 //
GS40samapviu:974: ebhir guṇair hīnamataś ca nityaṃ vidyād yavebhyo 'nyatha [ya] vānaśeṣaḥ /
